marketMakerRegisterSuccessful: Account {{account}} is successfully registered to Market Maker
marketMakerRegisterWait: Broadcasting Market Maker registration transaction. Please wait until the transaction is verified
marketMakerTurnOffWait: Broadcasting Market Maker account disable transaction. Please wait until the transaction is verified
marketMakerTurnOffSuccessful: Account {{account}} is successfully disabled on Market Maker
marketMakerTurnOnWait: Broadcasting Market Maker account enable transaction. Please wait until the transaction is verified
marketMakerTurnOnSuccessful: Account {{account}} is successfully enabled on Market Maker
marketMakerAddMarketWait: Broadcasting Market Maker add market transaction. Please wait until the transaction is verified
marketMakerAddMarketSuccessful: Market settings for {{tokenSymbol}} is successfully configured for account {{account}} on Market Maker
